title: Funding opportunity: Return to research support bursary
description: If you are a researcher looking to return to an academic research career after a break of two or more years, this bursary can help you to develop a proposal suitable for submission to the STFC fellowship scheme. You can apply for funding of up to Â£2,500 to cover the cost of activities that will help you prepare a proposal for STFC fellowship funding, such as: You may also use it to help cover the costs of preparing an application for funding, provided that you are a named researcher on the proposal.
